title: Wednesday Post Show – Canaan Cox Stops By (05-12-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show – Canaan Cox Stops By (05-12-21)
description:
Bobby talks about how Ellen is ending her talk show. Bobby also plays some voicemails from listeners addressing some of the things we talked about on the show including a defense on the ‘pay it forward’ line. We also talk more about the fuel shortage. Bobby also talks about Demi Lovato’s new show about UFOs. Bobby also talks more about the Bill Gates drama with naked pool parties. Canaan Cox also stops by randomly dropping by food so Bobby brings him in.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
